job_title: Senior Business Systems Analyst - Supply Chain Management

job_details.experience_required: 10+ years overall SAP experience with 5+ years of experience in ECC & S/4 (MM, PP)

jd: From: Sonu, Vkore sonu@vkoresolutions.com Reply to: sonu@vkoresolutions.com Hi,Hope you are doing well, Please find the job description below for the role of Senior Business Systems Analyst - Supply Chain Management and let me know if you are interested. Role: Senior Business Systems Analyst - Supply Chain ManagementLocation: Fremont CA Job Responsibilities:Solid hands-on experience in Source to Settle (S2S) processes, e.g., Material Requirement Planning, RFQ, forecasting, PO Management, Consignment, Sub-contracting and Supplier Collaboration, Capacity planning and Constraints, Inbound logistics, Costing and Supplier invoicingStrong experience in S4 Supply Chain Execution capabilities and SAP ECC MM/PP and RICEFWs with cross functional workstream impact analysisSolid hands-on experience in end to end Procure to Pay processes, e.g., master data, RFQ, forecasting, source determination, MRP, Inventory strategies (safety stock, consignment, replenishment, rebalancing, etc.), Sub-contracting, Purchase order (PO) managementAbility to connect multiple operations domains (Planning, Fulfillment, Manufacturing, Logistics, Spares Operations) and their interdependencies with ProcurementPartners closely with business partners, systems analysts, development, architecture and project teams to facilitate optimal solution design and deliveryTranslate the business requirements to functional specifications document, develop and own requirements traceability matrixAssist the Solution/Technical Architects in identifying and managing functionality and Application issues, risks, and scope creepExperience with both waterfall and agile project management methodologies, and ability to deliver on responsibilities during various project phases including:Requirements (Validation and Alignment) Design (Blueprint and Spec)Develop (Technical Spec, Prototyping, Configuration, and Unit testing)Test (Integration testing and User acceptance testing)Training/DocumentationDeploy (Cutover, Go Live)Run (Post-mortem, Hypercare)Able to manage multiple projects with competing priorities.Provide end user support during hyper careMust be able to demonstrate the skills and ability to build effective and productive relationships within and outside the immediate team and developers Minimum Qualifications:10+ years overall SAP experience with 5+ years of experience in ECC & S/4 (MM, PP)Demonstrated expertise across multiple enterprise systems include SAP and No code platformsHave worked in multiple end-to-end implementation projects, that included: Analysis, design, configuration, development build, test, and deployment, including training and data conversionStrong problem solving, analytical/critical thinking, oral/written communication skillsStrong interpersonal and stakeholder management skillsAbility to work independently or with limited direction
